title: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: Bug 14113: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
OB: The class file editor does not refresh when FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas occur.
EB: Upon encountering FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas, the expected behavior is to refresh the class file editor to reflect the changes in the source.
SR: 1. Open a Java file in the class file editor. 2. Introduce FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED delta by external means. 3. Observe that the class file editor does not automatically refresh. 4. Manually trigger a (FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH | FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta. 5. Confirm that the FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH is successfully removed once this bug is fixed.
